descriptionHtml:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17702][size=4]ORIGINAL[/size][/url]

Original mod was not displaying in game, did not show up in console, had rather.. unusual texture - so here it goes:

¤ Size decreased to more realistic
¤ Craftable
¤ Damage edited a tiny bit bigger (+2 or so from daedric greatsword)
¤ Shows up in game...
¤ Is searchable by console \"help fire 4\" 
¤ New textures (made for my use so i dont mind if you prefer the original ones - just drop them in my folder tree since the old one was messed up - texture path was broken.
author: Agito

files.name: Fix and Retex_Now Craftable and temperable
